body: So i recently changed my language to korean (cause u have to learn from the best) and ever since then i havent been getting any hextech crates? Ive gotten a lot of S's lately and it says i have 2 crates available but i dont get them

replies.body:
Changing your client language to Korean shouldn't impact your ability to earn chests since it's a local file change and cannot impact what's going on server-side. *Rineyy* provided some great info here, and the Hextech Crafting guide that was linked is a great resource as well.

If there are specific matches that you believe you were eligible to earn loot, but didn't, please give me a [match history link](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history) for the specific matches so I can take a look.

1. It isn't recommended to use 3rd party apps to modify the game.
2. You need to own the champion to earn a chest.
3. You can only earn one chest, per champ, per season.
4. If you were in a premade and a member of your premade achieved an S rank, that counts as a chest earned on the champ you played.

**[Learn to craft. Learn HexTech Crafting!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)**
